title: Planted Schnitzel Katsu Curry
instructions: Cook the planted.schnitzel according to package instructions until golden and crispy, about 3-4 minutes per side.
While the schnitzel cooks, prepare the katsu curry sauce by saut√©ing onion, garlic, and ginger in olive oil until softened.
Add curry powder, garam masala, and a tablespoon of flour, stirring for 1 minute until fragrant.
Pour in vegetable stock and coconut milk, simmer for 10 minutes until thickened, then season with soy sauce, honey, and salt.
Slice the crispy planted.schnitzel into strips and arrange over steamed rice.
Pour the warm katsu curry sauce over the schnitzel and serve immediately.
